articles.title: Cambodian Preparatory Committee Inaugurated
articles.content:
Cambodian Preparatory Committee Inaugurated 
    Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- A Cambodian preparatory committee was inaugurated in Phnom Penh on Jan. 14 to commemorate the Day of the Sun, birth anniversary of President  Kim Il Sung, and February 16, birthday of leader Kim Jong Il.
 At the instruction of the Cambodian king, Kong Sam Ol, deputy prime minister for the Royal Palace, was appointed as chairman of the preparatory committee, the senior minister who is minister of Health of the Royal government and a personal advisor to the king who is member of the Presidium the People's Party of Cambodia as vice-chairmen of the committee and the general secretary of the Council of Ministers, the chairman of the Cambodia-DPRK Friendship Association and the chairman of the Khmer Democratic Party and the deputy mayor of Phnom Penh Municipality as members of the preparatory committee.    
 The preparatory committee decided to organize colorful functions including meeting, film show and photo exhibition and widely introduce the exploits performed by the President and Kim Jong Il through media on the occasions of the Day of the Sun and February 16.

articles.title: Joint New Year Editorial Supported Abroad
Workshop on Koryo Medicine Inaugurated in Peru
articles.content:
Workshop on Koryo Medicine Inaugurated in Peru 
    Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- An inaugural ceremony of a workshop on Koryo medicine was held at Chiclayo University in Peru on Jan. 9.
 Present there were employees and students of the university including its professors and Doctors and the DPRK delegation for the workshop on Koryo medicine.    
 Deans of medical faculty and science faculty made speeches to be followed by lectures on Koryo medicine given by Korean doctors.

DPRK Delegation Leaves for Africa
articles.content:
DPRK Delegation Leaves for Africa
    Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- A DPRK delegation headed by Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, left Pyongyang Tuesday to visit African countries.
 It was seen off at the airport by Kim Yun Hyok, secretary of the SPA Presidium, and other officials concerned, Chinese Ambassador to the DPRK Wu Donghe and Nigerian Charge d' Affaires a.i. J.O. Akanni.

articles.title: Minister of People's Armed Forces Meets Vietnamese Ambassador
articles.content:
Minister of People's Armed Forces Meets Vietnamese Ambassador
    Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- Vice-Marshal of the Korean People's Army Kim Il Chol who is minister of the People's Armed Forces met and had a talk with Vietnamese Ambassador to the DPRK Do Thi Hoa who paid a farewell call on him Tuesday.
